basics.name: Bart J. Riepe
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am an experienced software developer and system administrator. I have worked for both startups and large corporations and know my way around both. I do my best work in an environment that values freedom and responsibility.

work.summary: Develop the Nature Index website, supplements and back-office system.
highlights: Rebuild academic ranking generation to be more maintainable and take only 1/10th of the time, saving up to 9h per ranking for +/- 50 rankings/month.
Adapted and migrated internal applications to our local CloudFoundry (Application) platform.
Mentor/manage junior developers to improve and grow their skills.
Generated ML model to help with matching our database of institutions to sometimes extremely arbitrary affiliation strings in academic articles.

work.summary: Manage all IT work for Rinkya Inc.
highlights: Redeveloped website, entirely overhauling customer experience, and automating many manual processes.
Implemented administrative system for correlating thousands of montly transactions to bank transfers.
Integrate with Fedex to automatically create invoices, customs declaration and package labels.
Implement Java application that approximates location of item RFID tags for locating inventory.

work.summary: Build & sell web-based products for SMB & NPOs based in the Netherlands.
highlights: Built highly customized (CMS backed) websites for small businesses in the Netherlands.
Created a platform for rapid iteration on customer feedback (e.g. Continuous Integration).
Several SaaS applications still under development.

work.summary: Consulting on software solutions for Dutch SMB and enterprises.
highlights: VBA application to automatically fill out all client information from external database.
Optimized questionnaire builder giving flawless performance regardless of size.
Chatbot for one of the 'Big Three' clubs of Dutch soccer play.
E-learning system later used in/as official dutch e-learning curriculum builder.

work.summary: Build internal systems to optimize/facilitate fonQ business processes and general systems administration.
highlights: Optimized customer search, from 4s to <1s, seriously reducing customer service representatives frustration when helping customers.
New application for our warehouse, which optimizes time spent walking as much as possible.
Uncountable scrapers for different e-commerce systems to ensure our lowest price guarantee.

projects.title: 98Clicks
projects.summary: 98Clicks stores and provides a daily selection of headline news from (almost) every country in the world.

projects.title: EVE Marketeer
projects.summary: EVE Marketeer was a statistics website and native client for the game EVE online. It provided players with information on the in-game market, OHLC charts, and predictions for optimal trading.

projects.title: Pokemon Online
projects.summary: Play Pokemon Go online in a format similar to the original pokemon games. Including battling other players you encounter.

volunteer.summary: Startup Weekends are weekend-long, hands-on experiences where entrepreneurs and aspiring entrepreneurs can find out if startup ideas are viable.

references.name: Heather Russell
references.reference: Excellent part of the Rinkya team!
